text: Joan Beverly Kroc (née Mansfield, previously Smith; August 27, 1928 – October 12, 2003), also known as Joni, was an American philanthropist and third wife of McDonald's CEO Ray Kroc. == References == Category:1928 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Philanthropists from Minnesota Category:Businesspeople from Minnesota
title: Joan Kroc
